page.title: 05CARDROSS _ FARMING
page.content: {DAIRY-}OF THE 10 FARMS ON OUR BLOCK 3 HAVE A DAIRY HERD. THEY ARE THE LOWER LYING FARMS MOLLANDHU, BADYEN AND CAIRNIEDROUTH WHICH ALSO HAVE ARABLE LANDS. {MIXED/ARABLE}FARMS ARE ARDMORE, LYLESTON, KILMAHEW, HIGH MILNDOVAN AND LOW MILNDOVAN. THE LAND IS LESS EASY TO CULTIVATE AS IT RISES AND BECOMES ROUGH GRAZING. {GARDEN CENTRE}IS A NEW VENTURE AT KIRKTON. IT HAS FOR SALE SHRUBS, PLANTS, HOME BAKING AND FRESH PRODUCE. IT IS EXPANDING RAPIDLY. {ALLOTMENTS-}DRUMHEAD HOUSE, NOW IN FLATS, HAD A WALLED GARDEN WHICH IS NOW AVAILABLE, IN PLOTS, TO VILLAGERS FOR A SMALL RENT.
